# Graphics Tutorials Step-by-step tutorials to help you master Vista Graphics drawing capabilities. ## Tutorials - [Drawing Primitives](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/drawing-primitives/) - Lines, shapes basics - [Gradients & Fills](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/gradients-fills/) - Gradients and fill styles - [Text & Images](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/text-images/) - Text and image rendering - [Transformations](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/transformations/) - Rotate, scale, translate - [Compositing & Layers](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/compositing-layers/) - Push/pop and compositing ## Prerequisites - Understanding of Vista Core concepts - Familiarity with canvas concepts - Basic drawing knowledge ## See Also - [Concepts](/wiki/graphics/concepts/) - Graphics fundamentals - [Drawing](/wiki/graphics/drawing/) - Drawing reference
